popularproducts.name: iPad 8
popularproducts.description: Apple iPad (8th generation) — A 10.2-inch iPad released in 2020, powered by the A12 Bionic chip (with Neural Engine), featuring a Retina display, Touch ID, 8 MP rear camera, and support for the original Apple Pencil — a well-rounded, affordable tablet for browsing, media, note-taking and everyday tasks.

popularproducts.name: iPhone X
popularproducts.description: Apple iPhone X — a pioneering 2017 iPhone featuring a 5.8-inch Super Retina OLED edge-to-edge display, the A11 Bionic chip, dual 12 MP rear cameras, Face ID facial recognition (replacing the home button), and support for wireless charging.

popularproducts.name: Samsung S21
popularproducts.description: Samsung Galaxy S21 — a flagship-class Android smartphone from Samsung, with a 6.2″ Dynamic AMOLED 2X display (120 Hz, FHD+), 5G support, and a versatile triple-lens rear camera (12 MP wide + 12 MP ultra-wide + 64 MP telephoto).

ios.name: iPhone X
ios.description: Apple iPhone X — A game-changing 2017 iPhone: it introduced a 5.8-inch edge-to-edge Super Retina OLED display, ditched the home button in favor of gesture navigation, added secure Face ID facial recognition, dual 12 MP rear cameras, and wireless charging — all powered by the A11 Bionic chip.

ios.name: iPhone 12
ios.description: Apple iPhone 12 — A 6.1-inch OLED-screen iPhone launched in 2020, powered by Apple’s A14 Bionic chip, with 5G support, dual 12 MP rear cameras, and a durable “Ceramic Shield” glass design that combines performance, modern display, and compact build for everyday use.

ios.name: iPhone 12 Pro
ios.description: Apple iPhone 12 Pro — a premium smartphone from Apple’s iPhone 12 lineup, featuring a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display, the powerful A14 Bionic chip, 5G support, and a triple-lens camera system (wide, ultra-wide and telephoto) with LiDAR and Dolby Vision HDR video for strong performance and excellent photo/video capabilities.

android.name: Xiaomi
android.description: Xiaomi is a global technology company known for producing affordable, high-quality smartphones, smart devices, and consumer electronics.

android.name: Samsung S21
android.description: Samsung Galaxy S21 is a flagship Android smartphone from Samsung’s Galaxy S-series, known for its sleek design, vibrant 6.2″ Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with 120 Hz refresh rate, 5G connectivity and a powerful triple-lens camera system — all wrapped in a compact form factor.
